tidbits.title: Vibrant Culture
tidbits.description: Cuba is renowned for its vibrant culture, including salsa music, Afro-Cuban rhythms, colorful vintage cars, and a rich tradition in art, literature, and dance.

tidbits.title: Colonial Architecture
tidbits.description: The country boasts stunning colonial architecture, particularly in cities like Havana and Trinidad, offering a glimpse into its Spanish colonial history.
